name: Potichat's adventure
description:
Potichat's Adventure

This is a very tiny mini baby plateformer I made during summer 2018.

On PC: X to jump (you have 3 of them!), C to run, arrows to move.

The main purpose of this prototype was to test the whole appearing/dissapearing plateforms idea. I think it has potential! But I don't quite have the time to develop it right now.

There is no sound in the game by the way, so don't freak out if you don't hear anything.

Have a good one!

("Potichat" means "Smolcat" in french, just so you know.)
